titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the well-ordering the trade of making and selling of soape.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Announcing commissions to inquire into the price of soap; enforcing the Soapmakers' Co. monopoly."--STC.
Dated at end: Giuen at the court at Theobalds the thirteenth day of Iuly, in the tenth yeere of Our reigne ...
Arms 24; Steele notation: Our Subiects 2)maliciously 3)the 4)Kingdoms command.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
